org.numenta.nupic.model

Class Column

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.model.Column
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Column>

    public class Column
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Column>, java.io.Serializable
    Abstraction of both an input bit and a columnal collection of Cells which have behavior associated with membership to a given Column
    Author:
    Chetan Surpur, David Ray
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Constructs a new Column

        numCells - number of cells per column
        index - the index of this column

    • Method Detail

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(int index)
        Returns the Cell residing at the specified index.

        IMPORTANT NOTE: the index provided is the index of the Cell within this column and is not the actual index of the Cell within the total list of Cells of all columns. Each Cell maintains it's own GLOBAL index which is the index describing the occurrence of a cell within the total list of all cells. Thus, Cell.getIndex() returns the GLOBAL index and not the index within this column.

        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Cell to return.
        Returns:
        the Cell residing at the specified index.
